about_the_game:
Death is killed.

Reality changes. Now, people no longer die. They can still fall on the battlefield. But their will, their conviction, their determination… It will now last throughout history.

What does that mean? Mi!

Mi mi mi!!!

The Mi Alliance is an army of cute blob-like soldiers. In this indie story adventure, you are the Leader Mi. You awaken in the middle of a forsaken battlefield where your comrades fell in battle. You are alone and outnumbered… But Mitopia shall prevail, whatever the cost!

Meet four friends- The Veteran, The Rogue, The Knight, and The Preacher, each with their own ideals. Lead your people through forsaken battlefields, lush forests, and other eerie environments, in search of your Purpose.

Why do we fight?

Make choices that decide the fate of Mi. Should you fight for peace, embracing the irony? Should you fight for the ultimate revenge against those that wronged you? Should you fight to appease the Angels and sacrifice innocent villagers to do so?

Are the Mi valorous crusaders or a death cult?!

The choice is yours. Can your choices change the ending?

Does war need any justification?

Maybe we should just kill the Enemy because they're called, well, the Enemy.

FORMATION!

Wave your flag proudly up high! Your army is your clay, and you are the sculptor. You will lead your Mi in battle by selecting Formations which decide how your Mi fight. Order a reckless Charge into the enemy, and Regroup on time for your Mi to heal and recover their wounds.

Learn through trial and error to find the greatest transitions, and minimize your losses.

Life is ephemeral. Experiences are temporary.

You’ve got only a single chance at this. That is the nature of life, after all.

This handcrafted three to four hour campaign tells the full soldier’s tale, full of heartwarming camaraderie, glorious determination, and great tragedy.

All features

  • Four Mi heroes to meet and befriend

  • Mi are cute and brave. They are your people. Lead them!

  • More than fifty choices and eight main story routes: Experience YOUR story

  • Eight Formations

  • Simple controls: No big brain strategy required

  • More than six unique types of Mi to lead into battle

  • Grab a gun and personally fight the Enemy

  • Ancient monks

  • Lots of lore

  • Original soundtrack to create your immersive experience

  • Learn something about why people like fighting each other so much

  • Meta plot
